FontString.name: OptionsText
FontString.text: Expand the MarkingBarLives (+) on the left to see the options.

FontString.name: showText
FontString.text: Always show |cffe1a500Marking|cff69ccf0Bar|cffff0000Lives|cffffffff with or without a target

FontString.name: ctrlShowText
FontString.text: Always show |cffe1a500Marking|cff69ccf0Bar|cffff0000Lives|cffffffff controls with or without a target

FontString.name: ctrlText
FontString.text: Connect |cffe1a500Marking|cff69ccf0Bar|cffff0000Lives|cffffffff's controls to the raid icons.

FontString.name: flareShowText
FontString.text: Always show |cffe1a500MBL|cff69ccf0Flares|cffffffff with or without a target

FontString.name: AnnounceInstText2
FontString.text: Enter the chat messages to send:

FontString.name: AnnouncerwText
FontString.text: Enter the chat message to send as a Raid Warning: (Only in a Raid)

FontString.name: AnnouncetooltipText
FontString.text: Add announce text to raid icon tooltips.
